{"id":1081428476,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 2 weeks","timestamp":1697989588,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1081428476/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Divide Two Integers","memory":"6.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    // Using Bit Manipulation to achieve the required result\n    int divide(int dividend, int divisor) {\n        if(dividend==INT_MIN && divisor==-1) return INT_MAX; // Manually handling last test case\n        if(dividend==divisor) return 1;\n        unsigned int a=abs(dividend),b=abs(divisor),quotient=0; // To avoid Overflow\n        // Sign of the Quotient will be handled later\n        bool positiveResult=(dividend<0 && divisor<0) || (dividend>=0 && divisor>0);\n        while(a>=b) {\n            int powerOf2=0;\n            while(a>b<<(powerOf2+1)) powerOf2++;\n            quotient+=1<<powerOf2; // Adding to the Result\n            a-=(b<<powerOf2);\n        }\n        return positiveResult?quotient:-quotient;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"divide-two-integers","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
